section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
source: EU Service Contract, Ministry of Finance
relevant_communication: Service contract by the Ministry of Trade and Industry on the Comparative Economic Advantages of Ghanaian Agricultural and Horticultural exports to the European Union
goals__remit:
1. Gathering and sharing information on trade barriers for European companies 
2. Advocacy and Lobbying for market access on behalf of European companies 
3. Advising host countries on how to do business with Europe and European companies 
4. Promoting European Business standards on transparency, like good corporate governance, Environment and Social Responsibilities 
5. Monitoring of the Free Trade Agreement (EPA) between the EU and Ghana
